review:
Dr. Manjula Gaekwad is treating my mother for endometrial cancer and she has always come across as very sensitive and empathetic. She puts her patient's comfort and concerns first. She took us into confidence by giving clear picture of the situation and the detailed treatment plan. The doctor has helped us to avoid many visits in the initial diagnostic phase by providing support on phone!
She did a radical hysterectomy last week and took care to make it painless for my mother given her old age. My mother is already healing very well and we completely trust Dr. Manjula to cure her of cancer.

The doctor did a Hysterectomy for my wife. 18 years back she also did the caesarian for my daughter. We were getting confusion signals on what to do, when to do it, invasive or invasive, etc.

The doctor gave full clarity upfront and we went with the procedure—speedy recovery, and very satisfied.

Dr Gaekwad is very compassionate, and friendly, has lots of patience, is transparent, very good in her domain.

*** ******* ******** ** *** ** * ****** ************* ** *** **** ****** She took me in confidence right d first time I met her.. With her experience n kind hearted nature she treats her patients both medically n psychologically.. I'm very much positive with d doctor n i will recommend her for sure..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was a very bad experience.  I was suffering from high bleeding. When I consulted her she gave me some medicines ***** ****** **** ***  Then within 1day I admitted in hospital due to low hemoglobin.  After few treatment she suggested me for a surgery ***** *** *** ** *** ********* My husband didn't agree. he told them to shift me another hospital then they stopped. ***** **** **** ** ******** *** *** ******* *** I kept on visiting her.After taking a huge money she stopped responding me properly.Whenever I met her she speaks me about surgery. so I stopped going to her.  Then  I consulted another Doctor Who told me there is no need of surgery. The bleeding I was getting after hospitalized was quite normal.  ***** *** ********** ****** *** ***** ******* ** * *** ******* *** ********* Guys before taking any decisions think twice.  ** * ***** **** **** *** **** ******* * ******** **** **** ** *********
She was very friendly and polite helped me to know about my problem...was satisfied with her treatment

Sagar hospital is under CGHS but gynecologist doctor don't want to see CGHS patients.what is the benefits of CGHS in gynecoloy doctor.and I talked to MD of Sagar hospital .they explained doctor will not see the patient in Rs135. Why doctor don't see the CGHS patient in gynecoloy department.
